data.title: Prime Video: My Fair Brady
data.meta_description: Adrianne Curry, winner of America's Next Top Model, demands that her lover, former Brady Bunch-er Christopher Knight, marry her or else she's moving out.
data.text:
Adrianne Curry & Christopher Knight set-up house together. Their age gap complicates matters. (He's 47, she's 22) "Mama Brady" Flo Henderson shows up to help. Their former roommate from Surreal Life Season 4, Jane Wiedlin invites them to a party.

Chris forgets Valentine's Day and tries to make up big-time to Adrianne. She is emotionally shocked on how romantic he truly can be. All is good until he tells her, he still wants her to move out.

Chris wants to spend "quality" time with Adrianne before he heads out alone for a 3-day weekend for a friend's wedding. Chris runs into his ex, Cindy Margolis at a photoshoot and Adrianne's friend, Andrea shows up to comfort her.

With Chris out of town for the weekend, Adrianne and her best friend, Andrea, go "Girls Gone Wild" and also decides to buy a car on a whim against Chris's orders not to. Chris now has 2nd thoughts about her moving out.

Feeling concerned that he didn't completely win over Adrianne's family in Joliet; Chris is starting to feel insecure in their relationship.

Chris and Adrianne wake up to the third day of their tropical Puerto Rican paradise wondering where the other person stands in this relationship.
